Initializer# init(pixelFormat:width:height:usage:mipmapsMode:timeout:)

iOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+Mac Catalyst 18.0+macOS 15.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 2.0+

```
init(
    pixelFormat: MTLPixelFormat,
    width: Int,
    height: Int,
    usage: MTLTextureUsage,
    mipmapsMode: TextureResource.MipmapsMode,
    timeout: Duration
)
```
